description.0: An angular box carved from gold and jade. Legend has it that it was once enshrined in a temple deep within Tulaytullah, the Sapphire City.

0.0: CRIT Rate is increased by <cryo>8%</cryo>. When the equipping character unleashes an Elemental Skill, they gain the Secret of Lies effect: Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>80</cryo> for 12s. When the equipping character deals Lunar-Bloom DMG to an opponent, they gain the Moon of Truth effect: CRIT DMG is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo> for 4s. When both the Secret of Lies and Moon of Truth effects are active at the same time, the results of both effects will be increased by 50%.
